title: Adding friends
body:
I'm new to the game and I can't add people,the bottom bar isn't showing up.What do I do to make the bottom bar come up?
All answers are appreciated.
Thank you for your patience and time.
~Leon{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: Hello! Try resizing your client by simply putting your mouse on one of the corners until the double arrows appear and dragging to the size you need.
This would be a great starting point. If you see anything like "disconnected from chat" or "reconnecting to chat" let me know and I'll do my best to help out.
